channel.title: Comments on: Oh No… My Child Speaks Leet
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
"If you don't know what leet speak is, you'll be in the dark".
How hard is it to understand: "H3y My p4reN+5 4R3 OUt OF +0wN thIS W33k3Nd"??? I just hope these kids are not going to design the army's future cryptograpic algorithms... R54
item.content:encoded:
“If you don’t know what leet speak is, you’ll be in the dark”.

How hard is it to understand:
“H3y My p4reN+5 4R3 OUt OF +0wN thIS W33k3Nd”??? I just hope these kids are not going to design the army’s future cryptograpic algorithms… R54
